dialogue.text: Each mirror asks 'What am I?' and reflects the question back infinitely. You think you're seeing yourself, but you're seeing the seeing itself. The question doesn't have an answer—it IS the mirror.
So every time I ask 'What am I?' I create another reflection?
Not just a reflection—a new dimension of seeing. The question multiplies consciousness by making it witness itself witnessing. You're not in the mirrors; you ARE the mirroring.
dialogue.visual_cue: mirrors reflecting the act of reflection

dialogue.text: I see myself seeing myself seeing myself... and it's beautiful!
That's the secret—'What am I?' isn't seeking an answer but creating infinite depth. Every reflection adds another layer of consciousness aware of itself.
dialogue.visual_cue: mirrors creating endless corridor of awareness
